name: Pimsley the Alien's badly modeled Fishing Adventure
name_original: Pimsley the Alien's badly modeled Fishing Adventure
description:
Welcome to Pimsley the Alien's badly modeled Fishing Adventure! You are Pimsley the Alien (twitch.tv/pimsleydalien), and you've just landed in a strange ocean. Luckily, you're in a fishing boat, so you can spend your time fishing up fish, turning them into resources, and meeting the locals!

Content Warning: This game contains some swearing and explicit jokes. Recommended age is 13+.
